### PROGRAMAS INFRMATICOS, IDIOMAS Y FORMACIN

```{r, fig.width=25}
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

CATEGORIAS <- c(rep("Edici贸n, documentaci贸n y presentaci贸n", 5), 
                rep("Programaci贸n y an谩lisis de datos", 9),
                rep("Herramientas visuales de an谩lisis y proveedores de datos deportivos", 5), 
                rep("Gesti贸n de bases de datos", 4), 
                rep("Idiomas", 2))

`PROGRAMAS INFORMTICOS` <- c("Microsoft Office", "Shiny", "Power BI", "Tableau", "Pentaho", "R", "Python", "SAS (Base, Enterpride Guide, SQL)",
                            "SPSS", "Statgraphics", "Eviews", "Spark (R, Python)", "Excel (VBA)", "C++", "NacSport (Scout PLUS)", "Eric SPORTS",
                            "OPTA", "Wyscout", "Instat", "MySQL", "MongoDB", "AWS (Redshift, S3)", "Azure", 
                            "Ingl茅s", "Franc茅s")
RATING <- c(4,5,5,4,4,5,5,4,3,3,3,5,5,3,4,4,4,4,4,5,4,4,5,4,3)

data <- cbind.data.frame(CATEGORIAS, `PROGRAMAS INFORMTICOS`, RATING)

rating_stars <- function(rating, max_rating = 5) {
  star_icon <- function(empty = FALSE) {
    tagAppendAttributes(shiny::icon("star"),
      style = paste("color:", if (empty) "#edf0f2" else "orange"),
      "aria-hidden" = "true"
    )
  }
  rounded_rating <- floor(rating + 0.5)  # always round up
  stars <- lapply(seq_len(max_rating), function(i) {
    if (i <= rounded_rating) star_icon() else star_icon(empty = TRUE)
  })
  label <- sprintf("%s out of %s stars", rating, max_rating)
  div(title = label, role = "img", stars)
}

reactable(
  data,
  groupBy = "CATEGORIAS",
  searchable = FALSE,
  columns = list(
    CATEGORIAS = colDef(minWidth = 165),
    `PROGRAMAS INFORMTICOS` = colDef(style = list(fontWeight = "bold")),
    RATING = colDef(cell = function(value) rating_stars(value))
  ),
  defaultExpanded = TRUE,
  defaultSorted = list(RATING = "desc")
)
```
